channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Border Patrol is monitoring US drivers and detaining those with ‘suspicious’ travel patterns
item.description: The U.S. Border Patrol is monitoring millions of American drivers nationwide in a secretive program to identify and detain people whose travel patterns it deems suspicious.

item.title: Multicultural New Orleans awaits arrival of ‘Swamp Sweep’ immigration crackdown
A bipartisan show of respect and remembrance is set for Dick Cheney’s funeral, absent Trump
